header_description: Best cooks and best delivery guys all at your service. Hot tasty food will reach you in less than 40 minutes.
easy_order_description: Order your food with only a few steps.
fast_delivery_description: Delivery is always on time and even faster.
variety_quality_description: Lots of quality  and affordable food options to choose from.

drop_location_description: Input address where your order will be delivered.
flexible_payment_description: Pay with Cash, Card, Mobile Money transfers, or on delivery.
for_restaurants_description: Order your food with only a few steps.
create_account_description: Setting up your online restaurant is fast and easy.
upload_menu_description: With just a few clicks, upload all the delicacies you have to offer.
manage_orders_description: From the comfort of your restaurant, manage customers' orders with a few clicks.
coming_soon_description_one: Best cooks and best delivery guys all at your service. Hot tasty food will reach you in less than 40 minutes.
